name: Froggyballers
description:
Overview:

The Froggyballers are here, and they're froggier than ever! Slam dunk and stuff and have fun but most importantly have fun.

Players:

2-4

Version:

0.1.0 Alpha

Currently supported controllers:

- DualShock 4

Controls:

Basic:

Direction  = Move
✕ = Jump
▢  = Lick / Stick
Options = Reset Ball & Players Position [Temporary - Used to fix any game-breaking issues]

Ground:

Down = Slide

Air:

✕ = Inflate

Whilst Stuck:

(Release) ▢ = Reel in tongue
(Release) ▢ + X = Detach

Whilst Inflated:

(Release) X + Direction = Boost

Whilst Swallowing:

(Hold) ▢ = Add power
(Release) ▢ + Direction = Spit

Whilst Swallowed:

X + Direction* = Escape 

*Must be holding the same direction as the player that swallowed you

FAQ:

Why is the controller not working?
Try restarting the game and not pressing any buttons until the title appears.

Why is everything else not working?
It's an early Alpha version, I'm sure whatever it is will be fixed eventually. Probably.

Game by Patrick Manville
Music by Patrick Manville
